tool_description: API for fetching the current Meta Data of all League of Legends Champions
name: League of Legends Champion Meta
title: League of Legends Champion Meta

api_list.name: Gets the Meta Data from one given Champion based on a rank
api_list.description:
Fetches the Data from the provided League of Legends Champion based on a rank.
Will return a list of Objects, because a Champion can be played in multiple roles

Possible rank parameters are: 
- placements
- iron
- bronze
- silver
- gold
- platinum
- diamond
- master
- grandmaster
- challenger
They also be combined with a "comma-sign": e.g challenger,master
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-champion-meta.p.rapidapi.com/champions/Brand/rank/grandmaster,challenger"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-champion-meta.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-champion-meta.p.rapidapi.com/champions/{name}/rank/{rankname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-champion-meta.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Gets all the Meta Data from all Champions based on a rank
api_list.description:
Fetches all the Meta Data in a provided rank.
Possible parameters are:
- placements
- iron
- bronze
- silver
- gold
- platinum
- diamond
- master
- grandmaster
- challenger
They also can be combined with a 'comma-sign': e.g. challenger**,**master
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-champion-meta.p.rapidapi.com/champions/all/rank/silver,master"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-champion-meta.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-champion-meta.p.rapidapi.com/champions/all/rank/{rankname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-champion-meta.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.name: Gets the Meta Data from one given Champion
api_list.description:
Fetches the Data from the provided League of Legends Champion.
Will return a list of Objects, because a Champion can be played in multiple roles

api_list.name: Gets the data from all League Champions
api_list.description: Fetches the Meta Data for all available League of Legends Champions

        }

api_list.name: Gets all the available Champions names, without any meta data
